items.title: ITC demerger update: Cash worth Rs 1,500 crore to be transferred to ITC Hotels for growth
items.description: ITC Hotels would be cumulatively incurring 8-10% of revenue on capital investments, on-going and new greenfield projects. The demerged entity will also be well-poised to execute 'selective inorganic opportunities' too, said ITC.

items.title: Jubilant FoodWorks: India business outlook improving, but valuation expensive
items.description: Improvement in Dominos same-store sales growth and scale-up of Popeyes franchise remain key growth triggers

items.title: Adani Wilmar shares down 7% a day after Adani's exit from FMCG business
items.description: Adani Wilmar shares are lower by 17% in 2024. JPMorgan's note has ascribed an Underweight with a target of Rs 320 per share, adding that the company has significant sourcing, supply chain and scale advantages.

items.title: Export-focused Unimech Aerospace says Make-in-India a 'massive opportunity' as listing sizzles Street
items.description: Unimech Aerospace said it is exploring opportunities in the nuclear power space as well as in semiconductors, along with plans to participate in domestic defence programmes.

items.title: Venus Remedies shares rise 3% as Moldova GMP nod paves way for East Europe expansion
items.description: The approval from Moldovan Health Ministry is for Venus' antibiotic-carbapenem facility. The nod for the facility will ensure 'access to high-quality, effective, and reliable antibiotics' across the region, said Venus Remedies.
